scripts.build: cd src && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf build/* && cp -r src/build/* build/ && echo 'Build artifacts copied successfully'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: mkdir -p build && npm run build && echo 'Verifying build artifacts:' && ls -la build/ && ls -la build/static/ && ls -la build/static/css/ && echo 'CSS files deployed successfully'
